title: Malek Shakuhi
text: Malek Shakuhi (; born 5 April 1960) is a <a href="Syrian">Syrian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">Goalkeeper</a> who played for <a href="Syria%20national%20football%20team">Syria</a> at the <a href="1984%20Asian%20Cup">1984 Asian Cup</a> and <a href="1988%20Asian%20Cup">1988 Asian Cup</a> finals.
